update.description:
Language updates.
Patch bash for CVE-2014-6271, 6277, 6278, 7169, 7186, 7187, openssl for CVE-2010-5298.
Upgrade linux kernel to 3.4-3 (3.4.104).
Upgrade bash to 4.3.30, bind to 9.9.5-P1, dhcpcd to 6.4.7, dnsmasq to 2.72, e2fsprogs to 1.42.12, fcron to 3.2.0, gnupg to 1.4.18, grep to 2.20, iproute2 to 3.16.0, libgcrypt to 1.6.2, libnl to 3.2.25, mdadm to 3.3.2, openssh to 6.7p1, openssl to 1.0.1j, openvpn to 2.3.4, ppp to 2.4.7, rsyslog to 7.6.7, squid to 3.4.8, squid-langpack to 20140506, syslinux to 6.02, tzdata to 2014h, vnstat to 1.13, util-linux to 2.25.1. Upgrade Perl modules IO-Socket-SSL to 1.997, NetAddr-IP to 4.075, Net-DNS to 0.75, Net-SSLeay to 1.63.
Upgrade e1000e network driver to 3.1.0.2, igb network driver to 5.2.9.4.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
